Posts.Content: May 28, 2014 05:18AM SeemaN wrote: Dear Akevia, I am sorry to hear about that.Constant mouth gargles,every  might half an hr might help.My mom was prescribed Tantum gargles which finally worked on her..If you can ,try having liquid energy drinks,smoothies,yoghurt and avoid anything near to being 'spicy' or any such ingredient.Might help! All the best and yes,pls keep me posted! Cheers
Posts.Title: Help needed : Constant stomach discomfort post weekly Navelbine SeemaN Akevia

Posts.Content: SeemaN wrote: Hello  everyone, I am posting on my behalf of my mom. She has been put on weekly Navelbine ( for 12 weeks) of which she has managed 5 so far. The first time she had it,mom had painful mouthsores and the 2nd injection had to be delayed. The 2nd went okay. From 3rd onwards she is experiencing uneasiness and pain in her stomach for which she has to take a painkiller everyday.Is this normal? When we went to the doc, he said it could be constipation or flatulence, but her motions are regular. I am worried and miserable to see her so down. Can you please share or help suggest about it? Also, today ( 3 days post her 5th injection),she again complained of the bonepain which she experienced around her foot. The kinds which she is able to relate to the disease. So does that mean , Navelbine is not working on her?? Please help! Dx 5/21/2011, 13/13 nodes, mets, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 5/24/2011 Mastectomy: Right Chemotherapy 6/16/2011 Ellence (epirubicin), Taxotere (docetaxel) Radiation Therapy 10/27/2011 Breast Radiation Therapy 3/23/2013 Bone Hormonal Therapy 4/23/2013 Faslodex (fulvestrant) Chemotherapy 10/22/2013 Abraxane (albumin-bound or nab-paclitaxel) Chemotherapy 4/4/2014 Navelbine (vinorelbine) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Help needed : Constant stomach discomfort post weekly Navelbine SeemaN Akevia

Posts.Content: May 28, 2014 05:15AM SeemaN wrote: You are right kicks.Will document.In her case the pain started initially while passing stool and then became a constant dull ache which aggravated at no noted timing( like nothing related to post /pre eating).Unless on painkiller she cant move about the house,and she still complains pain around ribcage( post last bone scan,the mets showed activity there).
